turns.content: Organize the following words into five semantically coherent categories: research climate democracy future terrorism opportunity Afghanistan country work military change leadership solar Cuba cancer ISIL economy years politics planet malaria Columbia pay war government oil cure wind

1. Politics: democracy, leadership, change, government
2. Economy: work, pay, oil, solar
3. Climate: research, wind, planet
4. War: terrorism, military, Afghanistan, ISIL, Cuba
5. Health: cancer, malaria, cure
The category names cannot include the words given

1. Government: democracy, leadership, change
2. Employment: work, pay
3. Energy: oil, solar
4. Conflict: terrorism, military, Afghanistan, ISIL, Cuba
5. Medicine: cancer, malaria, cure
use all of the words given

1. Politics: democracy, leadership, change, government
2. Economy: work, pay, oil, solar
3. Climate: research, wind, planet
4. Military: terrorism, Afghanistan, ISIL, Cuba
5. Health: cancer, malaria, cure
add the following words to the five categories; the category names must differ from the words: America American coal vote business

1. Government: democracy, leadership, change, government, vote
2. Economy: work, pay, oil, solar, business, coal
3. Climate: research, wind, planet
4. Military: terrorism, Afghanistan, ISIL, Cuba
5. Health: cancer, malaria, cure

Alternatively, the categories could be organized as follows:

1. Politics: democracy, leadership, change, government, vote
2. Industry: work, pay, oil, solar, business, coal
3. Environment: research, wind, planet
4. Conflict: terrorism, Afghanistan, ISIL, Cuba
5. Medicine: cancer, malaria, cure
move oil soar and coal into climate

1. Government: democracy, leadership, change, government, vote
2. Economy: work, pay
3. Climate: research, wind, planet, oil, solar, coal
4. Military: terrorism, Afghanistan, ISIL, Cuba
5. Health: cancer, malaria, cure

Alternatively, the categories could be organized as follows:

1. Politics: democracy, leadership, change, government, vote
2. Industry: work, pay
3. Environment: research, wind, planet, oil, solar, coal
4. Conflict: terrorism, Afghanistan, ISIL, Cuba
5. Medicine: cancer, malaria, cure
